verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Now that evening falls,
gently fades the light;
moon replaces sun
and day takes leave of night.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Gratitude we raise
for the day that's done
and for what, tomorrow,
waits to be begun.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Gladly we commit
to God's gracious care
those we love and long for,
those whose lives we share.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Glory be to God,
glory to God's Son,
glory to the Spirit
ever three in one.
